summary: Recovery is OUT - to change the addiction conversation from problems to SOLUTIONS. An independent feature documentary about the over 23 million Americans living in long-term recovery from alcohol and other drug addictions.
cast: Tom Coderre|Tara Conner|Laurie Dhue|Don Fertman|Frank Greenagel|Chris Herren|Kristen Johnston|Patrick Kennedy|William Cope Moyers|Jim Ramstad|Bill White
title: The Anonymous People
